content: easy peasy crochet project basket bag written by teresa jansen van vuuren pattern is written in us crochet terms the basket/bag in this photo was crocheted with a 4mm hook using elle pullskein dk supplies 150 200g double knit yarn crochet hook 3 5 4mm or to use with you chosen yarn yarn needle scissors 1 stitch marker difficulty level easy finished size for the basket in the photo size will differ if a different weight yarn and hook is used height approx 30 cm width of base approx 25 cm circumference approx 72 cm ©teresa jansen van vuuren 2018 for personal use only pattern may not be sold copied reproduced or shared online gauge not important for this project but you must aim for a denser crocheted fabric by maybe using a smaller hook than you usually use for the yarn used for the project abbreviations slip_stitch -
